entities.description: Hostility or discrimination against multi-racial groups.
Hostility or discrimination against Islamic groups or Muslims.
Hostility or discrimination against Hispanic or Latino groups.
Hostility or discrimination against individuals with mental disabilities.
Hostility or discrimination against Lesbian, Gay, Bisexual, or Transgender individuals or groups.
Hostility or discrimination against individuals who do not conform to typical gender norms.
Hostility or discrimination against individuals with physical disabilities.

relationships.description: Indicates that an individual experiences discrimination due to being part of a multi-racial group.
Indicates that a Muslim individual faces hostility due to their Islamic faith.
Indicates that a Hispanic or Latino individual experiences discrimination.
Indicates that an individual with mental disabilities faces hostility.
Indicates that an LGBT individual experiences discrimination.
Indicates that a gender non-conforming individual faces hostility.
Indicates that an individual with physical disabilities experiences discrimination.
